commit.message:
Refactored invocation of `lsof` to not use pipes for I/O, using files instead.
It removes the possibility of side effects that might affect the checking of pipe usage.

8291986: ProcessBuilder.redirectErrorStream(true) leaves error stream available
Added test to check pipe creation when spawning with and without `redirectErrorStream`.
Rewrote extraction of pipes to use `lsof` available on Mac and Linux.
Converted test to JUnit.
